name: Acolyte
description: You have spent your life in the service of a temple, learning divine magic and serving the needs of the faithful.

name: Criminal
description: You have a history of illegal activities, from burglary to extortion to smuggling.
equipment: Dark common clothes including a hood

name: Folk Hero
description: You come from humble origins and have achieved renown through your brave deeds and selfless acts.
tool proficiencies: Any one type of artisan's tools
equipment: A trophy taken from an animal you killed

name: Noble
description: You were born into a wealthy and influential family, and you have been trained in etiquette, diplomacy, and the ways of high society.

name: Soldier
description: You are a member of a military organization, from a large standing army to a small mercenary company.
equipment: Trophy taken from a fallen enemy

name: Sage
description: You have devoted your life to the pursuit of knowledge, and you have expertise in one or more fields such as history, arcana, or religion.
equipment: A letter from a dead colleague posing a question you have not yet been able to answer
